Description: Serpentine heart-scarab, elytra marked with double suture, unpierced, base inscribed with ten lines of white painted hieroglyphs. The inscription may be modern.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 74
Exhibition history: Exhibited: The British Museum/National Geographic: Treasures of the Earth. 2011 11 June- Present, 3 year renewable, Indianapolis,The Children’s Museum of Indianapolis, Treasures of the Earth
